titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States repealing the 22nd article of amendment, thereby removing the restrictions on the number of terms an individual may serve as President.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 2/16/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Repeals the 22d amendment to the Constitution (limitation on presidential terms).
